sect1.title: Writing Plugins
sect1.para: Plugins can be either loaded by Smarty automatically from the filesystem or they can be registered at runtime via one of the register_* API functions. They can also be unregistered by using unregister_* API functions.
For the plugins that are registered at runtime, the name of the plugin function(s) does not have to follow the naming convention.
